attributes.additional_details: Petition to review all Super League referrees performances with all major decisions made in a game looked at by the governing body on a game basis with the results of these published to the press/fans. If specific level of performance and consistency is not reached then have them moved down to the lower league giving younger more upcoming referrees a foothold in to the game. There needs to be more clarity with decisions and they need to be held accountable for blatant error's bordering on not doing their job correctly.

rejection.details: One for the rugby authorities, not the Government.
